description:
Her long time crush Knight Leader was haunted…!?
One night, Tina, the maid, overheard about her beloved Knight Leader’s trouble during cleaning.
Not wasting this opportunity, Tina did her best to make her chance-encounter a memorable one—however, she accidentally discovered her hidden talent…!?
Fluffy. Almost no horror elements at all.>
